subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Fourth-seeded Tommy Haas advanced to the quarterfinals of the Legg Mason Tennis Classic in Washington by beating Nicholas Mahut, 7-6 (4), 6-3. Haas had a tough time early: serving with a 5-3 lead in the first set, he double-faulted three times to give Mahut a break. Haas was joined in the quarterfinals by last year’s runner-up, John Isner, who defeated Donald Young, 6-4, 7-6 (4). Haas will face Alejandro Falla in the quarterfinals.
